ATO, meet compliance as code.

We’re working to streamline the government authority to operate process.

Visit the guide

A fresh approach to security compliance.

Government Compliance as Code is an open project working to streamline the government authority to operate process through compliance as code. Learn more.

Learn.

The Guide to Government Compliance as Code will help you understand the challenges, solutions and what role you play in streamlining the ATO process.

Contribute.

Everyone is welcome. Learn how you can contribute to Government Compliance as Code.
